en: Good, you made it. The resistance is [color=CHARTREUSE]growing stronger[/color]. Thanks to those manifests, people are seeing the truth.
I managed to get this dossier from our sources - production schedules, '[color=CRIMSON]ingredient[/color]' lists, names of the [color=DARK_SLATE_BLUE]disappeared[/color].
This isn't just a food supplement program. They're [color=CRIMSON]processing potatoes[/color]...and not in a good way.
Internal memos from Prime Minister Idaho himself, authorizing the "[color=DARK_ORANGE]utilization of rejected assets.[/color]"
Quotas for each checkpoint, with Spud Customs having the highest rejection-to-processing ratio.
The situation outside has deteriorated. Angry crowds gather at checkpoints demanding answers about Root Reserve.
[color=YELLOW]EMERGENCY BROADCAST[/color]: Recent circulation of [color=CRIMSON]forged documents[/color] has caused unnecessary panic.
A reward of [color=GOLD]10,000 Spud Credits[/color] is offered for information leading to the capture of these saboteurs.
Consuming or distributing this propaganda is now classified as [color=RED]high treason[/color].
Today's shift will operate under special protocols. Each traveler must undergo Loyalty Assessment.
Those demonstrating [color=CRIMSON]anti-government sentiments[/color] are to be flagged immediately.
The [color=CRIMSON]traitor in our midst[/color] will be found. And when they are... [draws finger across throat]

A nervous potato approaches, [color=GOLD]yellow leaf badge[/color] partially visible. A tiny note is tucked between papers: "[color=CHARTREUSE]Safe house compromised. New location: Warehouse 7, Sector 4.[/color]"
"Process them through quickly with the UV mark" (Help)
"Report them to security immediately" (Betray)
Relief floods their face. "Thank you. The truth will prevail."
Horror dawns as you signal security. "[wave amp=25 freq=3]No, please! I have a family![/wave]" Their yellow badge falls to the floor.
"Well done. Your loyalty is noted."
"Your decision was noticed. Be ready. [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]Something big is coming[/color][/tornado]. The resistance is planning a direct action."
"When it happens, you'll need to [color=YELLOW]choose a side[/color]. There won't be any middle ground left."
With each potato you process, you're either [pulse freq=2][color=CHARTREUSE]aiding a revolution[/color][/pulse] or [pulse freq=2][color=CRIMSON]enabling a horrific system[/color][/pulse].
